name: ❤️ attraction
description:
This is a short sokoban-like puzzle game, where you move magnetic pieces (the grey rounded rectangles) in order to collect little brightly-colored gems within a limited number of moves. Developed for and submitted to the Ebitengine Game Jam.  It's open source - find the source code in GitHub, and feel free to star, watch, contribute, or fork it into your own projects.

In honor of Pride Month 2022, the month when I developed this, the colors you collect build one of a set of Pride flags. Magnetism and love, let's all celebrate, support, and protect identity and attraction in all their forms.

Press arrow keys to pulse an electromagnet on the corresponding edge of the board: all the magnetic pieces will move one cell in the direction of that magnet if they are able, pushing any moveable pieces along the way.

This game is free. If you enjoy it, please consider contributing money or time to the Trevor Project, or any other group doing the important - sometimes thankless and dangerous - work of supporting the rights of women, people of color, and LGBTQ+ teens, children, adults, and families.
